posts.title: Hello 大头是傻逼
posts.text: 大头来自东北Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. GYer小婊子1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: 老婆 Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
